summary: At Zabriskie Point, United States' lowest point, two perfect strangers meet; an undergraduate dreamer and a young hippie student who start off an unrestrained romance, making love on the dusty terrain.
cast: Mark Frechette|Daria Halprin|Paul Fix|G.D. Spradlin|Bill Garaway|Kathleen Cleaver|Rod Taylor|Martin Abrahams|Michael L. Davis|Lee Duncan|George Dunn|Harrison Ford|Jim Goldrup|Norman Grabowski|Philip Baker Hall|Bill Hickman|Kenner G. Kemp|Peter Lake|Wesley Lau|Cec Linder|Boyd 'Red' Morgan|Bruce Neckels|Tom Steele|Johnny Wilson|Jeff Zinn
title: Zabriskie Point
